title: Counterfactual Narrative-Based Safety Education for Accident Prevention in the Construction Industry

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Construction Site Safety Regulations and Hazard Identification
context.additional_context: Provides educational scenarios based on real accident cases using Computation-Based Semi-Fictional Narrative Generation (CNSG) technology, enabling safe experiential learning of actual incidents

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more potential risk situations at construction sites
Learners can propose two or more accident prevention strategies through semi-fictional narrative-based scenarios
Learners can analyze generated narrative cases and design safety protocols applicable in real-world settings in three or more steps.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
